# FitConnect

> FitConnect is the UK's leading fitness coach marketplace connecting clients with certified personal trainers, boxing coaches, MMA coaches, nutritionists, and bodybuilding coaches. Book online or in-person sessions, purchase digital fitness products, and achieve your health goals.

FitConnect operates as a two-sided marketplace: clients can discover, book, and pay for fitness coaching services, while coaches can manage their business, clients, and digital products through the platform.

## Docs

- [How It Works](/how-it-works): Step-by-step guide for clients and coaches
- [For Coaches](/for-coaches): Information for fitness professionals joining the platform
- [Pricing](/pricing): Subscription plans and pricing details
- [FAQ](/faq): Frequently asked questions
- [About Us](/about): Company information and mission
- [Contact](/contact): Get in touch with support

## Features

### For Clients
- **Coach Discovery**: Search and filter coaches by specialty, location, price, and ratings
- **Online & In-Person**: Book virtual video sessions or face-to-face training
- **Verified Professionals**: All coaches verified for credentials and insurance
- **Secure Payments**: Safe payment processing via Stripe
- **Digital Products**: Purchase workout plans, nutrition guides, and ebooks
- **Progress Tracking**: Monitor fitness journey with wearable integrations
- **Reviews & Ratings**: Read authentic reviews from verified clients

### For Coaches
- **Business Dashboard**: Manage bookings, clients, and revenue
- **Client Management**: Track client progress and send personalized plans
- **Digital Products**: Sell workout programs, meal plans, and ebooks
- **Booking System**: 24/7 online booking with calendar integration
- **Payment Processing**: Receive payments directly to your bank account
- **Marketing Tools**: Profile optimization and visibility features
- **Analytics**: Track business performance and client engagement

## Coach Categories

- [Personal Trainers](/coaches/personal-trainers): Weight loss, strength training, general fitness
- [Boxing Coaches](/coaches/boxing): Boxing technique, conditioning, sparring
- [MMA Coaches](/coaches/mma): Mixed martial arts, self-defense, combat sports
- [Nutritionists](/coaches/nutritionists): Meal planning, macro coaching, dietary guidance
- [Bodybuilding Coaches](/coaches/bodybuilding): Competition prep, muscle building, physique coaching

## Browse

- [All Coaches](/coaches): Browse all fitness professionals
- [Digital Marketplace](/marketplace): Workout plans and fitness products
- [Blog](/blog): Fitness tips, nutrition advice, and industry insights

## Locations

FitConnect serves clients and coaches throughout the United Kingdom:
- London, Manchester, Birmingham, Leeds, Glasgow
- Edinburgh, Bristol, Liverpool, Sheffield, Newcastle
- And 100+ more cities nationwide
